mapper.select: SELECT * FROM el_sys_role WHERE id IN (SELECT role_id FROM el_sys_user_role WHERE user_id = #{userId})

SELECT DISTINCT mu.permission_tag FROM el_sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN el_sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN el_sys_menu mu ON rm.menu_id = mu.id WHERE mu.id IS NOT NULL AND mu.permission_tag IS NOT NULL AND mu.permission_tag!='' AND ur.user_id=#{userId}
SELECT ur.* FROM el_sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN el_sys_role role ON ur.role_id=role.id WHERE ur.user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY role.data_scope DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ur.user_id) FROM el_sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN el_sys_role role ON ur.role_id=role.id WHERE role.role_level < #{roleLevel} AND ur.user_id IN '${item}'
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(role_level),0) FROM el_sys_user_role rl LEFT JOIN el_sys_role role ON rl.role_id=role.id WHERE rl.user_id=#{userId};
